page.description: Create a CRLF delimited list of countries. Format string can contain 'Name' and 'Code'. E.g. To get data in form 'code - country', specify a format of 'code - name'

argument.name: Country_List
argument.description: An alphabetical listing of countries of the world.

argument.name: format
argument.description:
Optional. Specifies formatting information and whether to return the country name and/or country code.
"name" = Country name
"code" = Country code

page.discussion: The COUNTRIESOFWORLD() function returns a CR-LF delimited list of countries in the world. The function also optionally also returns a country code.
page.example: ? countriesOfWorld("code - name") = 001 - United States 002 - Afghanistan 003 - Albania ? countriesOfWorld("name") = United States Afghanistan
